author: rhuijben
msg: Following up on r35145 and r35143, block adding .svn directories to working
This is a low level fix that should prevent other instances of the same error.
(Checking on reserved names belongs in the working copy library, not the client
(svn_wc_add3): Check for administrative directory names before
adding entries to the working copy.

author: rhuijben
msg: Resolve basic_tests.py basic_add_svn_format_file by checking on
administrative directory names before creating a workingcopy in directories.
(add_parent_dirs): Move error clearing outside inner checks and check on
administrative directory names before calling svn_wc_add3.

author: rhuijben
msg: (SVN_ERR_MALFUNCTION_NO_RETURN): Make the loop containing abort() run
infinately to help compilers that don't recognize abort() behavior
see that this code never returns.

author: rhuijben
msg: Add XFail test to verify that it is not possible to add the .svn directory
to a working copy by using 'svn add --parents .svn/format'
(basic_add_svn_format_file): Add test verifying that svn add-parents

author: arfrever
msg: Try to use urllib.parse.* and urllib.request.* instead of urllib.* and urllib2.*.
urllib.request.* instead of urllib.* and urllib2.*.
